WITH empDept AS ( SELECT A.emp_id, A.dept_id, A.emp_name, B.dept_name FROM EMPLOYEES A LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENTS B ON A.dept_id = b.dept_id WHERE A.dept_Id = #{deptId} ) SELECT emp_id, dept_id, emp_name, dept_name, doc_number, doc_draft_date, doc_retention_period, doc_title, doc_document_data, B.doc_form_code, doc_holiday_type, doc_holiday_day, doc_holiday_start_date, doc_holiday_end_date, doc_biztrip_day, doc_biztrip_start_date, doc_biztrip_end_date, doc_biztrip_purpose, doc_holiday_work_start_date, doc_work_overtime_end_date, doc_apr_status, doc_form_name FROM empDept A LEFT OUTER JOIN DOCUMENT_FOLDER B USING(emp_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN DOCUMENT_FORM C ON B.doc_form_code = C.doc_form_code WHERE doc_number IS NOT NULL AND doc_apr_status NOT IN('폐기', '회수') ORDER BY DOC_DRAFT_DATE DESC

WITH empDept AS ( SELECT A.emp_id, A.dept_id, A.emp_name, B.dept_name FROM EMPLOYEES A LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENTS B ON A.dept_id = b.dept_id WHERE A.dept_Id = #{deptId} ) SELECT emp_id, dept_id, emp_name, dept_name, doc_number, doc_draft_date, doc_retention_period, doc_title, doc_document_data, B.doc_form_code, doc_holiday_type, doc_holiday_day, doc_holiday_start_date, doc_holiday_end_date, doc_biztrip_day, doc_biztrip_start_date, doc_biztrip_end_date, doc_biztrip_purpose, doc_holiday_work_start_date, doc_work_overtime_end_date, doc_apr_status, doc_form_name FROM empDept A LEFT OUTER JOIN DOCUMENT_FOLDER B USING(emp_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN DOCUMENT_FORM C ON B.doc_form_code = C.doc_form_code WHERE doc_number IS NOT NULL AND doc_apr_status IN('승인', '반려') ORDER BY DOC_DRAFT_DATE DESC

WITH referenceDoc AS ( SELECT * FROM REFERENCE_EMP WHERE emp_id = #{empId} ) SELECT B.*, C.doc_form_name FROM referenceDoc A LEFT OUTER JOIN DOCUMENT_FOLDER B ON A.doc_number = B.doc_number LEFT OUTER JOIN DOCUMENT_FORM C ON B.doc_form_code = C.doc_form_code WHERE doc_apr_status NOT IN('회수', '폐기') ORDER BY doc_draft_date DESC
